Articles.Content: So my brothers playing his Fav. game and im watching and he gos into the settings and theres a new feature and we test it it works and i started thinking "What would Kerbal be like with that feature?" so i figered i'd suggest it be implemented in to the game.

Could be, I suppose, but it's a resource-intensive feature that is provided already by an extensive array of existing programs, and in some cases the video card's device drivers themselves. If it's ever implemented, it's not going to be until very near the first complete iteration of the game, or possibly well afterwards, in my opinion.
